info.title: TwineSocial
info.description: Find and show content from Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, Vine, Tumblr, Flickr, Google+ by #hashtag, @account, geo-location. Powerful server-side rules. Blazing performance.

get.description: List all collections for a specified campaign.

parameters.name: campaign
parameters.description: The campaign name to retrieve collections from.

get.description: Retrieve content for a specific campaign.

parameters.name: campaign
parameters.description: The campaign name to retrieve content from.

parameters.name: collection
parameters.description: Limit results to items appearing in this Collection Id.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Optionally offset the result set. Used for pagination

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Optionally limits the results to contentItems with a particular status. Available statuses include active, modpending, moderated, brokenlink, and filtered.
